```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data = read_csv("mass-tracts.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(ggridges)
library(readr)

ggplot(data, aes(x = med_income, y = race, fill = race)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = 0.7, scale = 0.9)
```
